name: TRADEAI SAP Import Templates
description: Comprehensive SAP data import templates for Trade Promotions Management

templates.name: Customer Master Data
templates.description: Customer master data including sales org, distribution channel, payment terms

templates.name: Customer Hierarchy
templates.description: Customer hierarchy relationships and groupings

templates.name: Partner Functions
templates.description: Customer partner functions (sold-to, ship-to, bill-to, payer)

templates.name: Product Master Data
templates.description: Material master data including SKU, pricing, and product attributes

templates.name: Product Hierarchy
templates.description: Product hierarchy structure for reporting and analysis

templates.name: Product Sales Data
templates.description: Product sales organization data including tax class and pricing group

templates.name: Sales Actuals
templates.description: Billing documents with actual sales transactions

templates.name: Pricing Conditions
templates.description: Pricing condition records including discounts, rebates, and surcharges

templates.name: AR Deductions
templates.description: Accounts receivable deductions and short payments

templates.name: Claims
templates.description: Customer claims for promotions, rebates, and trade spend

templates.name: Deductions
templates.description: Customer deductions requiring research and resolution

templates.name: Trading Terms
templates.description: Trading term agreements including rebates and allowances

templates.name: Budgets
templates.description: Trade marketing and promotional budgets

templates.name: KAM Wallets
templates.description: Key Account Manager discretionary spend wallets

templates.name: Trade Spends
templates.description: Trade spend agreements and accruals

templates.name: Promotions
templates.description: Promotional programs and campaigns

templates.name: Campaigns
templates.description: Marketing campaigns spanning multiple promotions

templates.name: Activity Grid
templates.description: Marketing calendar activities and execution tracking

templates.name: Sales Organizations
templates.description: Sales organization master data

templates.name: Company Codes
templates.description: Company code master data

templates.name: Plants
templates.description: Plant and distribution center master data

templates.name: Exchange Rates
templates.description: Currency exchange rates for multi-currency reporting

templates.name: Units of Measure
templates.description: Unit of measure conversions

master_data.name: Master Data
master_data.description: Customer and product master data from SAP

transactional.name: Transactional Data
transactional.description: Sales actuals, pricing, AR deductions, and claims

planning.name: Planning Data
planning.description: Budgets, promotions, campaigns, and trade spend agreements

reference.name: Reference Data
reference.description: Organizational structures, exchange rates, and system configuration
